video.transcription: Welcome to this lesson on JavaScript variables and data types. In this video, we'll cover the fundamental concepts of variables, how to declare them, and the different data types available in JavaScript. Let's start with understanding what variables are and why they're important in programming.

slides.title: Introduction to Variables
slides.content: Variables are containers for storing data values in JavaScript
slides.notes: Start with enthusiasm and explain the importance of variables

slides.title: Variable Declaration
slides.content: Use let, const, or var to declare variables
slides.notes: Show examples of each declaration method

slides.title: Data Types Overview
slides.content: JavaScript has several data types: String, Number, Boolean, Object, Array
slides.notes: Explain each data type with examples

slides.title: Practical Examples
slides.content: Let's see variables in action with real code examples
